description:
cmd/vet: Fix handling of non-Stringer arguments.

First, %v and %T accept any arguments, so they should never warn.
Second, pointer types were not handled in matchArgType.
Third, the default response for matchArgType should be false.

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: adonovan@google.com, golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2031b827b4b2&repo=tools ***

cmd/vet: Fix handling of non-Stringer arguments.

First, %v and %T accept any arguments, so they should never warn.
Second, pointer types were not handled in matchArgType.
Third, the default response for matchArgType should be false.

R=r
CC=adonovan, golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12038050

subject: code review 12038050: cmd/vet: Fix handling of non-Stringer arguments.
